## Carry Recipe
_Hip Wrap Cross Carry – Base Size – Torso Pass + 2 Cross Passes_
- Torso Pass
- Cross in back and bring tails over shoulders
- Slide baby in pocket and scoot to hip
- Two Cross Passes, spread or bunched
- Tie in back or at hip
